body_html:
I installed the tensorflow 0.8 on a brand new ubuntu server, and I'm sure I was following the steps on the tensorflow website.
LD_LIBRARY_PATH = /usr/local/cuda-7.5/lib64
CUDA_HOME = /usr/local/cuda-7.5
I'm thinking if the cuda test can pass, and the CPU model went well. Can it be cuDNN that caused the bug?
Thanks!

body:
I installed the tensorflow 0.8 on a brand new ubuntu server, and I'm sure I was following the steps on the tensorflow website. 
LD_LIBRARY_PATH = /usr/local/cuda-7.5/lib64
CUDA_HOME = /usr/local/cuda-7.5
I'm thinking if the cuda test can pass, and the CPU model went well. Can it be cuDNN that caused the bug?
Thanks!
